ing: 3 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened lemon-lime flavored drink mix
1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice, chilled
des: "This punch is a special occasion family punch. Great to serve on Christmas, Thanksgiving and any time."
ins: Fill punch bowl 1/2 full with ice. Add drink mix, sugar and pineapple juice. Sir to dissolve. Place lime sherbet in punch bowl. Pour in the carbonated beverage. Gently stir and then serve in chilled glasses.
